title: Mr. Reckless 1948 | William Eythe, Barbara Britton (Adventure, Drama, Romance) Movie

sources.title: Mr. Reckless 1948 | William Eythe, Barbara Britton (Adventure, Drama, Romance) Movie
sources.description:
Oil field worker William Eythe returns to his hometown to discover his former girlfriend is going to marry an older cafe owner. Despite his best efforts to stay away, he is continually involved with the couple with tragic results.

Director: Frank McDonald
Writers: Maxwell Shane, Milton Raison
Stars: William Eythe, Barbara Britton, Walter Catlett
Genres: Adventure, Drama, Romance
Mr. Reckless (1948)
